name: linux-tc-notes
short_description:
This "project" contains notes I have written on the Linux Traffic control engine when developing scripts for it.

They are just simple text files, and are out of date.  Nonetheless, they are referred to over the web usually using the urls like http://ace-host.stuart.id.au/russell/files/tc/doc/cls_u32.txt.  That is probably because that file in particular is one only comprehensive documentation for the u32 filter.

If you have updates, the files are managed by Mercurial now.  Send me a patch.

You can read the files online at http://linux-tc-notes.sourceforge.net/
summary: Notes on the Linux Traffic Control Engine
